content.raw:
InsertModelTest.ReadPermissions is [failing on jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/195/#showFailuresLink). The log is:

```
 Start 297: INTEGRATION_insert_model

297: Test command: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/test/integration/INTEGRATION_insert_model "-xml" "-o" "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/test_results/INTEGRATION_insert_model.xml"
297: Test timeout computed to be: 240
133/134 Test #297: INTEGRATION_insert_model ..............................***Exception: Other 10.73 sec
```
And the message inside the xml results:

```
Error Message:
Unknown file:0 :: Received a fatal error.
```

I was not able to reproduce it in my local box and the error is different under a presence of an invalid DISPLAY value.

 Start 297: INTEGRATION_insert_model

297: Test command: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/test/integration/INTEGRATION_insert_model "-xml" "-o" "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/test_results/INTEGRATION_insert_model.xml"
297: Test timeout computed to be: 240
133/134 Test #297: INTEGRATION_insert_model ..............................***Exception: Other 10.73 sec

And the message inside the xml results:

Error Message:
Unknown file:0 :: Received a fatal error.

I was not able to reproduce it in my local box and the error is different under a presence of an invalid DISPLAY value.
